sentences.english: West Lake osmanthus lotus root starch, win set cake, double happiness, wonton dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 西湖桂花藕粉，定胜糕，幸福双，馄饨小笼。

sentences.english: I quickly scooped up another ravioli and popped it in my mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我飞快地舀起一个馄饨，放进嘴里。

sentences.english: Won tons are usually boiled and served in soup, but they can also be deep-fried.
sentences.chinese: 馄饨通常是煮好和汤一起吃的，但也可以油炸。

sentences.english: They thought the wonton soup and milky coffee combination was hilarious.
sentences.chinese: 宝钗和黛玉觉得馄饨汤和奶咖啡的搭配滑稽到家了。

sentences.english: They carry the poor Cang Li Man in front of Tang Gulu's wonton restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他们就这样把可怜的仓里满抬到了唐咕噜的馄饨店前。

sentences.english: Can also make small dumplings or wonton cooked for him to eat.
sentences.chinese: 也可以做成小饺子或馄饨煮给他吃。

sentences.english: Let me have your beef with pepper on your lunch specials and a bowl of wanton soup.
sentences.chinese: 我吃午餐特色菜牛肉炒青椒，再来一碗馄饨汤。

sentences.english: If you want something light, go for the won ton soup, jade dumpling (with scallops), and chicken feet.
sentences.chinese: 想吃清淡的，中午去吃碗馄饨，翡翠饺，凤爪。

sentences.english: The Camphor Dumpling is a smaller version of wonton .
sentences.chinese: 樟树包面类似馄饨，但要比馄饨小一号。

sentences.english: The Camphor Dumpling is a smaller version of wonton .
sentences.chinese: 樟树包面类似馄饨，但要比馄饨小一号。

sentences.english: I'd like a bowl of wonton soup.
Wonton with minced pork and green vegetable, Pork bone soup, Banana.
sentences.chinese: 青菜肉沫馄饨，大骨头汤，香蕉。

sentences.english: For instance, French president Nicolas Sarkozy loves fried wonton.
sentences.chinese: 如法国总统萨科齐爱吃炸馄饨。

sentences.english: And these winning wontons belong to…
sentences.chinese: 这些赢奖的馄饨是谁做的？

sentences.english: I had wonton noodles for my lunch today.
sentences.chinese: 今天午餐我吃了馄饨面。

sentences.english: I made a lot of wontons but still had some filling left.
sentences.chinese: 包了不少馄饨但还是剩陷儿了。

definition: wonton/see also 餛飩|馄饨[hun2 tun5]
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
